item.title: [FLINK-23797] SavepointITCase.testStopSavepointWithBoundedInput fails on azure

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: trohrmann@apache.org could that be connected to your recent changes to this test?
I couldn't find a problem caused by my recent changes.

merged commit c7bf8b3 into apache:master
merged as 856c927ba93 into release-1.14
